thread.title: Nancy Levy
thread.title_full: PlantShed New York Flowers reviewed by Nancy Levy

author: Nancy Levy
title: Nancy Levy
text: PlantShed delivered the flowers on time and my daughter, the recipient, said the flowers were exquisite..she sent me a photo and they looked just like the ones i ordered from the website. We both now plan to use the site again, which is very user friendly.
